display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9Nlh7GCiLCoQ7kNvwFactMA&_nc_oc=AdkX_AUJ0UQiF5vki2NHwvK5ZfAeAYBLLMvCzts0go__o3TptNihL7K72Zz0COoW0PI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8PZ6PmVeeTkYnlHmH7gNmw&oh=00_AfoUW7142Ft3PDYAL-G4OLuC2WhM6n_dbsskLUUPzB_9TA&oe=695B8A09)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=4UxbQso1XtMQ7kNvwH3IS_K&_nc_oc=AdnX7mLbBS5iRWShhr9KfyvYriNpSOhjpG941Yp8VNX27NlAyQ-kSg1d1AKX19nbgqo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8PZ6PmVeeTkYnlHmH7gNmw&oh=00_AfpfOcqdklqKG486s3E_tn5Op3g3eNa6i2QzuMWICSLHtg&oe=695B975D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-PkWQWFjms8Q7kNvwEHdC-g&_nc_oc=AdnEZXuX6tA-05l2smXW2ETk9Alrz4jB0tR7JQwIfaN7RNDunQwtkRg0IbeVHpYLScE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8PZ6PmVeeTkYnlHmH7gNmw&oh=00_AfpZRgCnQtRTlS_nScfY3bO5PfY4TohlXLeutfNE_wkOSw&oe=695B8512)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=2D6jpawzZtAQ7kNvwEmhgYY&_nc_oc=AdnJJak-8MJFP5FC1faQ9tlRE1IfcP0QfoRRzEk3CwuusJWlJVD_Pv3GXLoAiUo6PoU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8PZ6PmVeeTkYnlHmH7gNmw&oh=00_AfptcaGcXbf0dSUBlyYRqesMBKsUZZ6dKb-kijbtgk3QFQ&oe=695B9F42)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
